entry.title: Flex and The Cloud
entry.content:
The combination of Flex and The Cloud is quickly becoming an IT and paradigm changing combination. Here are a number of recently published resources for learning more about this :

  • An article I wrote has been published on the online Flash & Flex Developer's Magazine: Flex and The Cloud: Is this really just Client/Server 2.0?

  • I'll be speaking on Thursday, February 18 2010 at the Denver Flex User Group about Flex and The Cloud

  • The recording of a webinar I co-hosted on the new Salesforce.com Cloud platform for developers has been posted

  • Jeff Douglas has posted a video walk through showing how to use the new Salesforce.com Flash Builder 4 extension for Flex + Cloud apps

Exciting stuff! Let me know what you think!

entry.title: Matt Raible Compares Flex, GWT, Rails and Grails
entry.content: At the Rich Web Experience 2009 conference, Matt Raible presented a very insightful comparison of "kick-ass" web frameworks including Flex, Google Web Toolkit (GWT), Ruby on Rails and Grails. I appreciate his "right tool for the job" approach which moves beyond technology dogma towards real solutions.
